title: Two Weeks
resume: Jang Tae San is a man who has been living a meaningless life and  never thinks toward his future. He is on the run after being falsely  accused of murder. Furthermore, he discovers that he has a daughter who  is now suffering from leukemia. The drama spans exactly two weeks, and  tells about Tae San's desperate struggles to save his daughter.
